title: 303.1 Semester Project:Extending DIPY’s Generalized Q-ball Imaging model to make predictions
text:
This project is part of the 303.1 semester project course.
The goal is to contribute to the DIPY framework by extending the Generalized Q-ball Imaging (GQI) model with predictive capabilities.
The key objectives are:

Implementing a predict() function to the GeneralizedQSamplingFit class
Thoroughly documenting the new code
Providing comprehensive and meaningful tests
Getting the prediction pull request accepted by DIPY

title: Implementation Report: Predict Function
text:
This report provides an overview of the implemented predict function, covering its purpose, operational mechanics, testing methodology, capabilities, and future directions.
Key topics include:

Functionality and operation of the predict function
Testing procedures applied to the function
Enabled applications and subsequent development steps

title: Daily diary
text:
25.11.2025

Meeting with Prof. Esteban
Prepared the DIPY development environment

Installation steps

Create a venv and source it (or use uv venv and uv pip …)
To build the project

sudo dnf install python3-devel
pip install -r requirements/build.txt
pip install –no-build-isolation -e .

To build the documentation

pip install sphinx
pip install sphinx_gallery
pip install numpydoc
pip install sphinxcontrib-bibtex
pip install sphinx-design
pip install grg-sphinx-theme

To use the correct formatting

pip install –no-build-isolation -e .[style]
pip install pre-commit
pre-commit install



Started to look at the current gqi predict code and pull request
Continued reading the Nipreps book (tried to fix a latex rendering error unsuccessfully)

title: Daily diary
text:
26.11.2025

Finished reading the Nipreps book
Continued to look at the current gqi code and made small changes on the enh/gqi-predict-dev branch

Changed GeneralizedQSamplingFit odf function to take a sphere parameter (see commit)
Changed the GeneralizedQSamplingFit predict function to use clamping to remove negative value predictions (see commit)

Created a small marimo notebook to test and understand the prediction function on the enh/gqi-predict-notebooks branch (see commit)

title: Daily diary
text:
27.11.2025

Changed the GeneralizedQSamplingFit predict function to use the model mode when calling the predict_kernel function. Also made the predict function work for multi-voxels (see commit)
Started gqi predict tests with (see commit)

Single-voxel basic test
Single-voxel meaningful test
Multi-voxel basic test
Multi-voxel meaningful test

Meeting with Prof. Esteban
Did 2 marimo notebooks on the enh/gqi-predict-notebooks branch (see commit)

A notebook regarding the roundtrip predictions on already seen data (see notebook)
A notebook regarding cross voxel predictions (see notebook)

Created the 303.1-semester-project github page (see page)
